'Motion: Live: 9.17.97', commonly referred to as 'Motion', is a live EP released
by The Mayfield Four, released in 1997. It is a very rare item and is a highly
sought after collector's item among fans. Myles Kennedy (Former Mayfield Four
vocalist) States that "only about 5,000 copies were ever made."

Some people have noticed that the CD itself has no bar code. So it is unlikely
that they were sold or distributed as a normal CD would be.
